verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came בִּשְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> both עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <WH6240> ten שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> year בִּשְׁנֵי־ <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֥ר <WH6240> ten חֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH2320> in the twelfth month בְּאֶחָ֣ד <WH259> in the first לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of the month הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> [that] the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of man שָׂ֤א <WH5375> take up קִינָה֙ <WH7015> a lamentation עַל־ <WH5921> over פַּרְעֹ֣ה <WH6547> for Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> and say אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to כְּפִ֥יר <WH3715> a young lion גּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> of the nations נִדְמֵ֑יתָ <WH1819> unto him Thou art like וְאַתָּה֙ <WH859> you כַּתַּנִּ֣ים <WH8577> the monster בַּיַּמִּ֔ים <WH3220> in the seas וַתָּ֣גַח <WH1518> and thou camest forth בְּנַהֲרוֹתֶ֗יךָ <WH5104> with thy rivers וַתִּדְלַח־ <WH1804> and troubledst מַ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> the waters בְּרַגְלֶ֔יךָ <WH7272> with thy feet וַתִּרְפֹּ֖ס <WH7515> and fouledst נַהֲרוֹתָֽם׃ <WH5104> their rivers

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD וּפָרַשְׂתִּ֤י <WH6566> I will therefore spread out עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5921> over אֶת־ <WH853> רִשְׁתִּ֔י <WH7568> my net בִּקְהַ֖ל <WH6951> over thee with a company עַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> people רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> of many וְהֶעֱל֖וּךָ <WH5927> and they shall bring thee up בְּחֶרְמִֽי׃ <WH2764> in my net

וּנְטַשְׁתִּ֣יךָ <WH5203> Then will I leave בָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> thee upon the land עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> upon the open הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> field אֲטִילֶ֑ךָ <WH2904> I will cast thee forth וְהִשְׁכַּנְתִּ֤י <WH7931> to remain עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> all ע֣וֹף <WH5775> and will cause all the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of the heaven וְהִשְׂבַּעְתִּ֥י <WH7646> upon thee and I will fill מִמְּךָ֖ <WH4480> at חַיַּ֥ת <WH2416> the beasts כָּל־ <WH3605> of the whole הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the whole earth

וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> And I will lay אֶת־ <WH853> בְּשָׂרְךָ֖ <WH1320> thy flesh עַל־ <WH5921> on הֶֽהָרִ֑ים <WH2022> upon the mountains וּמִלֵּאתִ֥י <WH4390> and fill הַגֵּאָי֖וֹת <WH1516> the valleys רָמוּתֶֽךָ׃ <WH7419> with thy height

וְהִשְׁקֵיתִ֨י <WH8248> I will also water אֶ֧רֶץ <WH776> the land צָפָתְךָ֛ <WH6824> wherein thou swimmest מִדָּמְךָ֖ <WH1818> with thy blood אֶל־ <WH413> far הֶֽהָרִ֑ים <WH2022> [even] to the mountains וַאֲפִקִ֖ים <WH650> and the rivers יִמָּלְא֥וּן <WH4390> shall be full מִמֶּֽךָּ׃ <WH4480> at

וְכִסֵּיתִ֤י <WH3680> I will cover בְכַבּֽוֹתְךָ֙ <WH3518> And when I shall put thee out שָׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> the heaven וְהִקְדַּרְתִּ֖י <WH6937> thereof dark אֶת־ <WH853> כֹּֽכְבֵיהֶ֑ם <WH3556> the stars שֶׁ֚מֶשׁ <WH8121> the sun בֶּעָנָ֣ן <WH6051> with a cloud אֲכַסֶּ֔נּוּ <WH3680> I will cover וְיָרֵ֖חַ <WH3394> and the moon לֹא־ <WH3808> will not יָאִ֥יר <WH215> shall not give אוֹרֽוֹ׃ <WH216> her light

כָּל־ <WH3605> All מְא֤וֹרֵי <WH3974> All the bright אוֹר֙ <WH216> lights בַּשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of heaven אַקְדִּירֵ֖ם <WH6937> will I make dark עָלֶ֑יךָ <WH5921> over וְנָתַ֤תִּי <WH5414> over thee and set חֹ֙שֶׁךְ֙ <WH2822> darkness עַֽל־ <WH5921> over אַרְצְךָ֔ <WH776> upon thy land נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD

וְהִ֨כְעַסְתִּ֔י <WH3707> I will also vex לֵ֖ב <WH3820> the hearts עַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> people רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> of many בַּהֲבִיאִ֤י <WH935> when I shall bring שִׁבְרְךָ֙ <WH7667> thy destruction בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> among the nations עַל־ <WH5921> into אֲרָצ֖וֹת <WH776> into the countries אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not יְדַעְתָּֽם׃ <WH3045> which thou hast not known

וַהֲשִׁמּוֹתִ֨י <WH8074> amazed עָלֶ֜יךָ <WH5921> and עַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> people רַבִּ֗ים <WH7227> Yea I will make many וּמַלְכֵיהֶם֙ <WH4428> at thee and their kings יִשְׂעֲר֤וּ <WH8175> afraid עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5921> and שַׂ֔עַר <WH8178> shall be horribly בְּעוֹפְפִ֥י <WH5774> for thee when I shall brandish חַרְבִּ֖י <WH2719> my sword עַל־ <WH5921> before פְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> before them וְחָרְד֤וּ <WH2729> and they shall tremble לִרְגָעִים֙ <WH7281> at [every] moment אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man לְנַפְשׁ֔וֹ <WH5315> for his own life בְּי֖וֹם <WH3117> in the day מַפַּלְתֶּֽךָ׃ <WH4658> of thy fall ס

כִּ֛י <WH3588> For כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3068> GOD חֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> The sword מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> of the king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> of Babylon תְּבוֹאֶֽךָ׃ <WH935> shall come

בְּחַרְב֤וֹת <WH2719> By the swords גִּבּוֹרִים֙ <WH1368> of the mighty אַפִּ֣יל <WH5307> to fall הֲמוֹנֶ֔ךָ <WH1995> will I cause thy multitude עָרִיצֵ֥י <WH6184> the terrible גוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> of the nations כֻּלָּ֑ם <WH3605> all וְשָֽׁדְדוּ֙ <WH7703> all of them and they shall spoil אֶת־ <WH853> גְּא֣וֹן <WH1347> the pomp מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְנִשְׁמַ֖ד <WH8045> thereof shall be destroyed כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הֲמוֹנָֽהּ׃ <WH1995> and all the multitude

וְהַֽאֲבַדְתִּי֙ <WH6> I will destroy אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all בְּהֶמְתָּ֔הּ <WH929> also all the beasts מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> thereof from מַ֣יִם <WH4325> waters רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> beside the great וְלֹ֨א <WH3808> will not תִדְלָחֵ֤ם <WH1804> trouble רֶֽגֶל־ <WH7272> neither shall the foot אָדָם֙ <WH120> of man ע֔וֹד <WH5750> anymore וּפַרְס֥וֹת <WH6541> them any more nor the hoofs בְּהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> of beasts לֹ֥א <WH3808> will not תִדְלָחֵֽם׃ <WH1804> trouble

אָ֚ז <WH227> Then אַשְׁקִ֣יעַ <WH8257> deep מֵֽימֵיהֶ֔ם <WH4325> Then will I make their waters וְנַהֲרוֹתָ֖ם <WH5104> and cause their rivers כַּשֶּׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> like oil אוֹלִ֑יךְ <WH1980> to run נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD

בְּתִתִּי֩ <WH5414> When I shall make אֶת־ <WH853> אֶ֨רֶץ <WH776> the land מִצְרַ֜יִם <WH4714> of Egypt שְׁמָמָ֣ה <WH8077> desolate וּנְשַׁמָּ֗ה <WH8074> shall be destitute אֶ֚רֶץ <WH776> and the country מִמְּלֹאָ֔הּ <WH4393> of that whereof it was full בְּהַכּוֹתִ֖י <WH5221> when I shall smite אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all י֣וֹשְׁבֵי <WH3427> all them that dwell בָ֑הּ וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> therein then shall they know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD

קִינָ֥ה <WH6969> wherewith they shall lament הִיא֙ <WH1931> This וְק֣וֹנְנ֔וּהָ <WH7015> This [is] the lamentation בְּנ֥וֹת <WH1323> her the daughters הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> of the nations תְּקוֹנֵ֣נָּה <WH6969> shall lament אוֹתָ֑הּ <WH853> עַל־ <WH5921> Over מִצְרַ֤יִם <WH4714> for her [even] for Egypt וְעַל־ <WH5921> and over כָּל־ <WH3605> all הֲמוֹנָהּ֙ <WH1995> and for all her multitude תְּקוֹנֵ֣נָּה <WH6969> her they shall lament אוֹתָ֔הּ <WH853> נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD פ

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came בִּשְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> both עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <WH6240> ten שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> year בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <WH2568> fif עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> teen לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of the month הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> [that] the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man נְהֵ֛ה <WH5091> wail עַל־ <WH5921> for הֲמ֥וֹן <WH1995> for the multitude מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְהוֹרִדֵ֑הוּ <WH3381> and cast them down א֠וֹתָהּ <WH853> וּבְנ֨וֹת <WH1323> [even] her and the daughters גּוֹיִ֧ם <WH1471> nations אַדִּרִ֛ם <WH117> of the famous אֶל־ <WH413> about אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> of the earth תַּחְתִּיּ֖וֹת <WH8482> unto the nether parts אֶת־ <WH854> for י֥וֹרְדֵי <WH3381> with them that go down בֽוֹר׃ <WH953> into the pit
מִמִּ֖י <WH4310> Whom נָעָ֑מְתָּ <WH5276> Whom dost thou pass in beauty רְדָ֥ה <WH3381> ? go down וְהָשְׁכְּבָ֖ה <WH7901> and be thou laid אֶת־ <WH854> with עֲרֵלִֽים׃ <WH6189> with the uncircumcised

בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst חַלְלֵי־ <WH2491> of [them that are] slain חֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> by the sword יִפֹּ֑לוּ <WH5307> They shall fall חֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> to the sword נִתָּ֔נָה <WH5414> she is delivered מָשְׁכ֥וּ <WH4900> draw אוֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> וְכָל־ <WH3605> her and all הֲמוֹנֶֽיהָ׃ <WH1995> her and all her multitudes

יְדַבְּרוּ־ <WH1696> shall speak ל֞וֹ אֵלֵ֧י <WH410> The strong גִבּוֹרִ֛ים <WH1368> among the mighty מִתּ֥וֹךְ <WH8432> to him out of the midst שְׁא֖וֹל <WH7585> of hell אֶת־ <WH854> that עֹֽזְרָ֑יו <WH5826> with them that help יָֽרְד֛וּ <WH3381> him they are gone down שָׁכְב֥וּ <WH7901> they lie הָעֲרֵלִ֖ים <WH6189> uncircumcised חַלְלֵי־ <WH2491> slain חָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> by the sword

שָׁ֤ם <WH8033> is there אַשּׁוּר֙ <WH804> Asshur וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all קְהָלָ֔הּ <WH6951> [is] there and all her company סְבִֽיבוֹתָ֖יו <WH5439> [are] about קִבְרֹתָ֑יו <WH6913> his graves כֻּלָּ֣ם <WH3605> her All חֲלָלִ֔ים <WH2491> him all of them slain הַנֹּפְלִ֖ים <WH5307> fallen בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> by the sword

אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whose נִתְּנ֤וּ <WH5414> are set קִבְרֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH6913> Whose graves בְּיַרְכְּתֵי־ <WH3411> in the sides ב֔וֹר <WH953> of the pit וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> become קְהָלָ֔הּ <WH6951> and her company סְבִיב֖וֹת <WH5439> is round about קְבֻרָתָ֑הּ <WH6900> her grave כֻּלָּ֤ם <WH3605> All חֲלָלִים֙ <WH2491> all of them slain נֹפְלִ֣ים <WH5307> fallen בַּחֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> by the sword אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who נָתְנ֥וּ <WH5414> which caused חִתִּ֖ית <WH2851> terror בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land חַיִּֽים׃ <WH2416> of the living

שָׁ֤ם <WH8033> is there עֵילָם֙ <WH5867> There [is] Elam וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הֲמוֹנָ֔הּ <WH1995> and all her multitude סְבִיב֖וֹת <WH5439> round about קְבֻרָתָ֑הּ <WH6900> her grave כֻּלָּ֣ם <WH3605> all חֲלָלִים֩ <WH2491> all of them slain הַנֹּפְלִ֨ים <WH5307> fallen בַּחֶ֜רֶב <WH2719> by the sword אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יָרְד֥וּ <WH3381> which are gone down עֲרֵלִ֣ים ׀ <WH6189> uncircumcised אֶל־ <WH413> of אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the earth תַּחְתִּיּ֗וֹת <WH8482> into the nether parts אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who נָתְנ֤וּ <WH5414> which caused חִתִּיתָם֙ <WH2851> their terror בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land חַיִּ֔ים <WH2416> of the living וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <WH5375> yet have they borne כְלִמָּתָ֖ם <WH3639> their shame אֶת־ <WH854> for י֥וֹרְדֵי <WH3381> with them that go down בֽוֹר׃ <WH953> to the pit

בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst חֲ֠לָלִים <WH2491> of the slain נָתְנ֨וּ <WH5414> They have set מִשְׁכָּ֥ב <WH4904> her a bed לָהּ֙ בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הֲמוֹנָ֔הּ <WH1995> with all her multitude סְבִֽיבוֹתָ֖יו <WH5439> [are] round about קִבְרֹתֶ֑הָ <WH6913> her graves כֻּלָּ֣ם <WH3605> are all עֲרֵלִ֣ים <WH6189> him all of them uncircumcised חַלְלֵי־ <WH2491> slain חֶ֡רֶב <WH2719> by the sword כִּֽי־ <WH3588> נִתַּ֨ן <WH5414> was caused חִתִּיתָ֜ם <WH2851> though their terror בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land חַיִּ֗ים <WH2416> of the living וַיִּשְׂא֤וּ <WH5375> yet have they borne כְלִמָּתָם֙ <WH3639> their shame אֶת־ <WH854> for י֣וֹרְדֵי <WH3381> with them that go down ב֔וֹר <WH953> to the pit בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst חֲלָלִ֖ים <WH2491> of [them that be] slain נִתָּֽן׃ <WH5414> he is put

שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> are there מֶ֤שֶׁךְ <WH4902> There [is] Meshech תֻּבַל֙ <WH8422> Tubal וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הֲמוֹנָ֔הּ <WH1995> and all her multitude סְבִֽיבוֹתָ֖יו <WH5439> [are] round about קִבְרוֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH6913> her graves כֻּלָּ֤ם <WH3605> All עֲרֵלִים֙ <WH6189> him all of them uncircumcised מְחֻ֣לְלֵי <WH2490> slain חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> by the sword כִּֽי־ <WH3588> though נָתְנ֥וּ <WH5414> though they caused חִתִּיתָ֖ם <WH2851> their terror בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land חַיִּֽים׃ <WH2416> of the living

וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> Nor יִשְׁכְּבוּ֙ <WH7901> And they shall not lie אֶת־ <WH854> beside גִּבּוֹרִ֔ים <WH1368> with the mighty נֹפְלִ֖ים <WH5307> [that are] fallen מֵעֲרֵלִ֑ים <WH6189> of the uncircumcised אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who יָרְדֽוּ־ <WH3381> which are gone down שְׁא֣וֹל <WH7585> to hell בִּכְלֵֽי־ <WH3627> with their weapons מִלְחַמְתָּם֩ <WH4421> of war וַיִּתְּנ֨וּ <WH5414> and they have laid אֶת־ <WH853> חַרְבוֹתָ֜ם <WH2719> their swords תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under רָאשֵׁיהֶ֗ם <WH7218> under their heads וַתְּהִ֤י <WH1961> rested עֲוֹֽנֹתָם֙ <WH5771> but their iniquities עַל־ <WH5921> on עַצְמוֹתָ֔ם <WH6106> shall be upon their bones כִּֽי־ <WH3588> though חִתִּ֥ית <WH2851> though [they were] the terror גִּבּוֹרִ֖ים <WH1368> of the mighty בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land חַיִּֽים׃ <WH2416> of the living

וְאַתָּ֗ה <WH859> in בְּת֧וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst עֲרֵלִ֛ים <WH6189> of the uncircumcised תִּשָּׁבַ֥ר <WH7665> Yea thou shalt be broken וְתִשְׁכַּ֖ב <WH7901> and shalt lie אֶת־ <WH854> for חַלְלֵי־ <WH2491> with [them that are] slain חָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> with the sword

שָׁ֣מָּה <WH8033> There אֱד֗וֹם <WH123> There [is] Edom מְלָכֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH4428> her kings וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all נְשִׂיאֶ֔יהָ <WH5387> and all her princes אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who נִתְּנ֥וּ <WH5414> are laid בִגְבוּרָתָ֖ם <WH1369> which with their might אֶת־ <WH854> for חַלְלֵי־ <WH2491> by [them that were] slain חָ֑רֶב <WH2719> by the sword הֵ֛מָּה <WH1992> like אֶת־ <WH854> with עֲרֵלִ֥ים <WH6189> with the uncircumcised יִשְׁכָּ֖בוּ <WH7901> they shall lie וְאֶת־ <WH854> for יֹ֥רְדֵי <WH3381> and with them that go down בֽוֹר׃ <WH953> to the pit

שָׁ֣מָּה <WH8033> There נְסִיכֵ֥י <WH5257> There [be] the princes צָפ֛וֹן <WH6828> of the north כֻּלָּ֖ם <WH3605> all וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all צִֽדֹנִ֑י <WH6722> all of them and all the Zidonians אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יָרְד֣וּ <WH3381> which are gone down אֶת־ <WH854> with חֲלָלִ֗ים <WH2491> with the slain בְּחִתִּיתָ֤ם <WH2851> with their terror מִגְבֽוּרָתָם֙ <WH1369> of their might בּוֹשִׁ֔ים <WH954> they are ashamed וַיִּשְׁכְּב֤וּ <WH7901> and they lie עֲרֵלִים֙ <WH6189> uncircumcised אֶת־ <WH854> for חַלְלֵי־ <WH2491> with [them that be] slain חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> by the sword וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <WH5375> and bear כְלִמָּתָ֖ם <WH3639> their shame אֶת־ <WH854> for י֥וֹרְדֵי <WH3381> with them that go down בֽוֹר׃ <WH953> to the pit

אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> יִרְאֶ֣ה <WH7200> shall see פַרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> Pharaoh וְנִחַ֖ם <WH5162> them and shall be comforted עַל־ <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> for all [הֲמֹונֹה כ] (הֲמֹונֹ֑ו <WH1995> abundance ק) חַלְלֵי־ <WH2491> slain חֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH2719> by the sword פַּרְעֹ֣ה <WH6547> [even] Pharaoh וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all חֵיל֔וֹ <WH2428> and all his army נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Though נָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> For I have caused אֶת־ <WH853> [חִתִּיתֹו כ] (חִתִּיתִ֖י <WH2851> terror ק) בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land חַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> of the living וְהֻשְׁכַּב֩ <WH7901> and he shall be laid בְּת֨וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst עֲרֵלִ֜ים <WH6189> of the uncircumcised אֶת־ <WH854> for חַלְלֵי־ <WH2491> with [them that are] slain חֶ֗רֶב <WH2719> with the sword פַּרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> [even] Pharaoh וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הֲמוֹנֹ֔ה <WH1995> and all his multitude נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD פ
